participant_1.background:
I build my own computers.
I was a mechanic for 6 years.
I thought of joining the military when i was younger.
I ran for political office in 2004.
I collect bugs in jars.

participant_2.background:
I am a diabetic.
I like to read.
I listen to podcasts.
I have a long drive to work.
Traffic makes me mad.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you. How are you?
I'm doing good too. I'm a bit tired, but I'm looking forward to the weekend.
Me too! I have a long drive to work, but I'm looking forward to reading a book on my way there.
That sounds like a good way to pass the time. I used to be a mechanic, so I know how long it can take to drive to work.
I'm not surprised. I'm a diabetic, so I have to stop every few hours to check my blood sugar.
That sounds annoying. I'm glad I don't have to deal with that.
It is, but it's not so bad. I've been doing it for so long that it's become second nature.
That's good to hear. So, what do you do for fun?
I like to read, listen to podcasts, and watch TV. I also like to go for walks in the park.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to build my own computers, collect bugs, and run for political office.
That's interesting. Why do you like to run for political office?
I think it's important to make a difference in the world, and I think that politics is a great way to do that.
That's a good answer. I'm glad you're passionate about something.
Thanks. I'm glad you're passionate about reading and podcasts.
Thanks. I'm glad we could have this conversation.
Me too. I hope we can talk again soon.
